name: mhapy-web
description: A web interface for the mental health application, MHAPy.

scripts.setup: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.ci-setup: npm ci && cd client && npm ci && cd ..
scripts.build-run: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && node server.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm ci && cd client && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.format: prettier --write . && eslint . --fix && cd client && eslint . --fix && cd ..
